summary: This is a Bank of America personal signature card and substitute Form W-9 for a joint account, dated February 6, 2004. It includes account holder information, tax certification, and a request for an ATM/Check card. The document appears to be a standard bank account opening form.

persons.name: Shivani Durve
persons.context: Appears as the bank associate's name on the account opening form.

events.title: Bank Account Opening
events.description: A joint bank account was opened at Bank of America, with signature cards and tax forms completed.

keyFacts: A Bank of America joint account was opened on February 6, 2004.
The document includes a substitute Form W-9 for tax reporting purposes.
An ATM/Check card was requested for the account.
The banking center was located at Broadway and Warren.
The bank associate handling the account was Shivani Durve.
